question:
There is a Paragraphs:  Hoping to rebound from their loss to the Patriots, the Raiders stayed at home for a Week 16 duel with the Houston Texans.  Oakland would get the early lead in the first quarter as quarterback JaMarcus Russell completed a 20-yard touchdown pass to rookie wide receiver Chaz Schilens.  The Texans would respond with fullback Vonta Leach getting a 1-yard touchdown run, yet the Raiders would answer with kicker Sebastian Janikowski getting a 33-yard and a 30-yard field goal.  Houston would tie the game in the second quarter with kicker Kris Brown getting a 53-yard and a 24-yard field goal. Oakland would take the lead in the third quarter with wide receiver Johnnie Lee Higgins catching a 29-yard touchdown pass from Russell, followed up by an 80-yard punt return for a touchdown.  The Texans tried to rally in the fourth quarter as Brown nailed a 40-yard field goal, yet the Raiders' defense would shut down any possible attempt..
Answer questions based on the article 
Question: How many field goals did Kris Brown kick?

中文問題
這有一段文字：希望從輸給愛國者的比賽中反彈，突襲者隊留在主場進行了第16週與休斯頓德州人隊的對決。奧克蘭隊在第一節取得早期領先，四分衛傑馬庫斯·羅素完成了一次20碼的觸地傳球給新秀外接手查茲·席倫斯。德州人隊會以全衛馮塔·里奇的1碼觸地跑來回應，但突襲者隊會以踢球手塞巴斯蒂安·雅尼科夫斯基的33碼和30碼的射門得分來回應。休斯頓隊在第二節以踢球手克里斯·布朗的53碼和24碼的射門得分將比分扳平。奧克蘭隊在第三節取得領先，外接手約翰尼·李·希金斯接到了來自羅素的29碼觸地傳球，隨後是一次80碼的棄踢回攻觸地得分。德州人隊試圖在第四節反擊，布朗命中了一記40碼的射門得分，但突襲者隊的防守阻止了任何可能的嘗試。
根據文章回答問題
問題：克里斯·布朗踢進了多少個射門得分？

Oakland would take the lead in the third quarter with wide receiver Johnnie Lee Higgins catching a 29-yard touchdown pass from Russell, followed up by an 80-yard punt return for a touchdown. The Texans tried to rally in the fourth quarter as Brown nailed a 40-yard field goal, yet the Raiders' defense would shut down any possible attempt.
Answer questions based on the article
Question: How many field goals did Kris Brown kick?

首先，我需要定位到文章中提及克里斯·布朗（Kris Brown）的部分。文章提到“休斯頓隊在第二節以踢球手克里斯·布朗的53碼和24碼的射門得分將比分扳平。”，這表示他在第二節踢進了兩個射門。然後文章又提到“德州人隊試圖在第四節反擊，布朗命中了一記40碼的射門得分”，這表示他在第四節踢進了一個射門。所以總共他踢進了2+1=3個射門得分。

中文助手A答案
3

The question asks how many field goals Kris Brown kicked.
The passage states: "Houston would tie the game in the second quarter with kicker Kris Brown getting a 53-yard and a 24-yard field goal." This means he kicked 2 field goals in the second quarter.
The passage also says: "The Texans tried to rally in the fourth quarter as Brown nailed a 40-yard field goal..." This means he kicked 1 field goal in the fourth quarter.

English Assistant B Answer

question:
There is a Paragraphs:  Coming off their road loss to Green Bay, Washington returned home for a duel at FedExField with the Detroit Lions, matching up with them for the first time since 2010, but the first time in DC since 2007. After teams exchanged punts in the first, Washington struck first when Lions quarterback Matthew Stafford was intercepted by Redskins cornerback DeAngelo Hall who returned the interception 9 yards for a 7-0 Washington lead.Detroit responded right away, however, as running back Joique Bell broke numerous tackles on his way to a 12-yard touchdown, evening the score at 7-7. The first quarter would conclude without any further scoring. Early in the second, Detroit finished off a drive with Stafford finding tight end Joseph Fauria for a 5-yard score to give Detroit the 14-7 lead. Later in the second, after a few missed opportunities by both teams, Redskins running back Alfred Morris took off for a 30-yard score, evening the score at 14-14 late in the second. Washington's much-maligned defense, however, could not hold it and Detroit retook the lead before halftime thanks to a David Akers 32-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 17-14 edge and halfway to its first win ever in Washington. Early in the third, Washington was able to equalize with John Potter making his first career field goal from 43 yards out.Both teams failed to score again, and the teams went into the final quarter tied at 17. Early in the fourth, Detroit took the lead again, this time by way of Akers hitting a 28-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 20-17 lead. On Washington's ensuing possession, it appeared as if Washington took the lead, as Robert Griffin III found wide receiver Aldrick Robinson for a 57-yard score and an apparent 24-20 lead. However, upon video replay, it showed Robinson was bobbling the ball as he fell to the ground, thus the apparent pass was ruled incomplete, and Washington could not score again, punting. Detroit marched down the field and all but sealed the deal, as Stafford connected with superstar Calvin Johnson with just under four minutes remaining in the game. Washington didn't give up, however, and John Potter connected from 21 yards out to cut the lead to 27-20. However, after not recovering the onside kick, Washington needed to stop Detroit. They did this, and got the ball back with just under 50 seconds remaining. Washington got to midfield, but Griffin's hail mary pass was off the mark, and Washington lost once again. With the loss. Washington fell to 0-3 for the first time since 2001, and also lost to the Detroit Lions for the third straight time, having not beaten them since 2008 when they didn't even manage to win a single game. However, Washington lost to Detroit at home for the first time since 1935, when they were still the Boston Redskins. They had never, prior to this day, lost to Detroit in Washington or Landover..
Answer questions based on the article 
Question: How many points were scored in the first quarter?

中文問題
文章段落：在客场输给绿湾之后，华盛顿回到了主场FedExField，与底特律雄狮队进行了一场对决，这是自2010年以来的首次交锋，但却是自2007年以来首次在华盛顿特区进行比赛。第一节双方互踢弃踢后，华盛顿率先得分，雄狮队四分卫马修·斯塔福德被红皮队角卫迪安杰洛·霍尔截球，霍尔回攻9码，华盛顿以7-0领先。然而，底特律立即回应，跑卫乔伊克·贝尔突破多次擒抱，冲入12码达阵，将比分扳成7-7。第一节以没有进一步得分结束。第二节初，底特律完成了一次进攻，斯塔福德找到近端锋约瑟夫·福里亚，以5码的得分让底特律以14-7领先。第二节晚些时候，在双方错失了几次机会后，红皮队跑卫阿尔弗雷德·莫里斯冲出30码的得分，在第二节末将比分扳成14-14。然而，华盛顿备受诟病的防守未能守住，底特律在中场休息前凭借大卫·阿克斯的32码任意球重新取得领先，让底特律以17-14领先，并完成了在华盛顿取得首胜的一半路程。第三节初，华盛顿凭借约翰·波特职业生涯中的第一个43码任意球扳平比分。两队再次未能得分，比赛进入了以17平进入最后一节。第四节初，底特律再次取得领先，这次是通过阿克斯命中28码任意球，让底特律以20-17领先。在华盛顿随后的进攻中，罗伯特·格里芬三世找到外接手奥尔德里克·罗宾逊，完成了一次57码的得分，并以24-20领先。然而，通过视频回放显示，罗宾逊在倒地时一直在颠球，因此这次明显的传球被判为未完成，华盛顿未能再次得分，选择弃踢。底特律推进到球场，几乎锁定了胜局，斯塔福德在比赛还剩不到四分钟时与超级巨星卡尔文·约翰逊连接。然而，华盛顿并没有放弃，约翰·波特命中21码任意球，将比分追至27-20。然而，在未能抢回侧踢球后，华盛顿需要阻止底特律。他们做到了，并在还剩不到50秒的时间里拿回了球权。华盛顿推进到中场，但格里芬的万福玛利亚传球偏离了目标，华盛顿再次失利。随着这场失利，华盛顿自2001年以来首次以0-3开局，并且连续第三次输给底特律雄狮队，自2008年以来就没有击败过他们，当时他们甚至没有赢得一场比赛。然而，华盛顿自1935年以来首次在主场输给底特律，当时他们仍然是波士顿红皮队。在此之前，他们从未在华盛顿或兰多弗输给底特律。
根据文章回答问题
问题：第一节得了多少分？

The first quarter would conclude without any further scoring. Early in the second, Detroit finished off a drive with Stafford finding tight end Joseph Fauria for a 5-yard score to give Detroit the 14-7 lead. Later in the second, after a few missed opportunities by both teams, Redskins running back Alfred Morris took off for a 30-yard score, evening the score at 14-14 late in the second. Washington's much-maligned defense, however, could not hold it and Detroit retook the lead before halftime thanks to a David Akers 32-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 17-14 edge and halfway to its first win ever in Washington. Early in the third, Washington was able to equalize with John Potter making his first career field goal from 43 yards out.Both teams failed to score again, and the teams went into the final quarter tied at 17. Early in the fourth, Detroit took the lead again, this time by way of Akers hitting a 28-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 20-17 lead. On Washington's ensuing possession, it appeared as if Washington took the lead, as Robert Griffin III found wide receiver Aldrick Robinson for a 57-yard score and an apparent 24-20 lead. However, upon video replay, it showed Robinson was bobbling the ball as he fell to the ground, thus the apparent pass was ruled incomplete, and Washington could not score again, punting. Detroit marched down the field and all but sealed the deal, as Stafford connected with superstar Calvin Johnson with just under four minutes remaining in the game. Washington didn't give up, however, and John Potter connected from 21 yards out to cut the lead to 27-20. However, after not recovering the onside kick, Washington needed to stop Detroit. They did this, and got the ball back with just under 50 seconds remaining. Washington got to midfield, but Griffin's hail mary pass was off the mark, and Washington lost once again. With the loss. Washington fell to 0-3 for the first time since 2001, and also lost to the Detroit Lions for the third straight time, having not beaten them since 2008 when they didn't even manage to win a single game. However, Washington lost to Detroit at home for the first time since 1935, when they were still the Boston Redskins. They had never, prior to this day, lost to Detroit in Washington or Landover..

The first quarter would conclude without any further scoring. Early in the second, Detroit finished off a drive with Stafford finding tight end Joseph Fauria for a 5-yard score to give Detroit the 14-7 lead. Later in the second, after a few missed opportunities by both teams, Redskins running back Alfred Morris took off for a 30-yard score, evening the score at 14-14 late in the second. Washington's much-maligned defense, however, could not hold it and Detroit retook the lead before halftime thanks to a David Akers 32-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 17-14 edge and halfway to its first win ever in Washington. Early in the third, Washington was able to equalize with John Potter making his first career field goal from 43 yards out.Both teams failed to score again, and the teams went into the final quarter tied at 17. Early in the fourth, Detroit took the lead again, this time by way of Akers hitting a 28-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 20-17 lead. On Washington's ensuing possession, it appeared as if Washington took the lead, as Robert Griffin III found wide receiver Aldrick Robinson for a 57-yard score and an apparent 24-20 lead. However, upon video replay, it showed Robinson was bobbling the ball as he fell to the ground, thus the apparent pass was ruled incomplete, and Washington could not score again, punting. Detroit marched down the field and all but sealed the deal, as Stafford connected with superstar Calvin Johnson with just under four minutes remaining in the game. Washington didn't give up, however, and John Potter connected from 21 yards out to cut the lead to 27-20. However, after not recovering the onside kick, Washington needed to stop Detroit. They did this, and got the ball back with just under 50 seconds remaining. Washington got to midfield, but Griffin's hail mary pass was off the mark, and Washington lost once again. With the loss. Washington fell to 0-3 for the first time since 2001, and also lost to the Detroit Lions for the third straight time, having not beaten them since 2008 when they didn't even manage to win a single game. However, Washington lost to Detroit at home for the first time since 1935, when they were still the Boston Redskins. They had never, prior to this day, lost to Detroit in Washington or Landover..
Answer questions based on the article 
Question: How many points did the Lions win by?

以下是一段文章：在客場輸給綠灣之後，華盛頓回到主場FedExField與底特律雄獅隊進行了一場決鬥，這是自2010年以來他們首次交鋒，但自2007年以來首次在華盛頓特區交鋒。在第一節雙方互踢球後，華盛頓率先得分，當時雄獅隊四分衛馬修·斯塔福德被紅皮隊角衛德安傑洛·霍爾攔截，霍爾將球回攻9碼，華盛頓以7-0領先。然而，底特律立即做出回應，跑衛喬伊克·貝爾突破多次擒抱，以12碼達陣，將比分扳成7-7。第一節結束時沒有任何其他得分。第二節初，底特律完成了一次進攻，斯塔福德找到近端鋒約瑟夫·福里亞，以5碼的成績得分，使底特律以14-7領先。第二節晚些時候，在雙方錯失幾次機會後，紅皮隊跑衛阿爾弗雷德·莫里斯以30碼的成績得分，在第二節末將比分扳成14-14。然而，華盛頓備受詬病的防守無法守住，底特律在上半場結束前憑藉大衛·阿克斯的32碼射門重新取得領先，使底特律以17-14領先，並完成了在華盛頓的首場勝利的一半。第三節初，華盛頓憑藉約翰·波特命中了他職業生涯的第一次43碼射門扳平了比分。兩隊再次未能得分，兩隊在最後一節以17平進入。第四節初，底特律再次取得領先，這次是通過阿克斯命中28碼射門，使底特律以20-17領先。在華盛頓隨後的一次控球中，羅伯特·格里芬三世找到外接手奧爾德里克·羅賓遜，以57碼的成績得分，華盛頓以24-20領先。然而，通過視頻回放顯示，羅賓遜在倒地時正在顛球，因此這個明顯的傳球被判無效，華盛頓未能再次得分，只能棄踢。底特律推進到球場，幾乎鎖定了勝局，斯塔福德在比賽還剩不到四分鐘時與超級巨星卡爾文·約翰遜連接。然而，華盛頓沒有放棄，約翰·波特在21碼外命中，將比分追至27-20。然而，在未能恢復側踢後，華盛頓需要阻止底特律。他們做到了這一點，並在還剩不到50秒時重新拿回球。華盛頓到達中場，但格里芬的萬福瑪利亞傳球沒有命中，華盛頓再次失利。隨著失利，華盛頓自2001年以來首次以0-3開局，並且連續第三次輸給底特律雄獅隊，自2008年以來就沒有擊敗過他們，當時他們甚至沒有贏得一場比賽。然而，華盛頓自1935年以來首次在主場輸給底特律，當時他們仍然是波士頓紅皮隊。在此之前，他們從未在華盛頓或蘭多弗輸給底特律。
根據文章回答問題
問題：雄獅隊贏了多少分？

Later in the second, after a few missed opportunities by both teams, Redskins running back Alfred Morris took off for a 30-yard score, evening the score at 14-14 late in the second. Washington's much-maligned defense, however, could not hold it and Detroit retook the lead before halftime thanks to a David Akers 32-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 17-14 edge and halfway to its first win ever in Washington. Early in the third, Washington was able to equalize with John Potter making his first career field goal from 43 yards out.Both teams failed to score again, and the teams went into the final quarter tied at 17. Early in the fourth, Detroit took the lead again, this time by way of Akers hitting a 28-yard field goal, giving Detroit a 20-17 lead. On Washington's ensuing possession, it appeared as if Washington took the lead, as Robert Griffin III found wide receiver Aldrick Robinson for a 57-yard score and an apparent 24-20 lead. However, upon video replay, it showed Robinson was bobbling the ball as he fell to the ground, thus the apparent pass was ruled incomplete, and Washington could not score again, punting. Detroit marched down the field and all but sealed the deal, as Stafford connected with superstar Calvin Johnson with just under four minutes remaining in the game. Washington didn't give up, however, and John Potter connected from 21 yards out to cut the lead to 27-20. However, after not recovering the onside kick, Washington needed to stop Detroit. They did this, and got the ball back with just under 50 seconds remaining. Washington got to midfield, but Griffin's hail mary pass was off the mark, and Washington lost once again. With the loss. Washington fell to 0-3 for the first time since 2001, and also lost to the Detroit Lions for the third straight time, having not beaten them since 2008 when they didn't even manage to win a single game. However, Washington lost to Detroit at home for the first time since 1935, when they were still the Boston Redskins. They had never, prior to this day, lost to Detroit in Washington or Landover..

However, upon video replay, it showed Robinson was bobbling the ball as he fell to the ground, thus the apparent pass was ruled incomplete, and Washington could not score again, punting. Detroit marched down the field and all but sealed the deal, as Stafford connected with superstar Calvin Johnson with just under four minutes remaining in the game. Washington didn't give up, however, and John Potter connected from 21 yards out to cut the lead to 27-20. However, after not recovering the onside kick, Washington needed to stop Detroit. They did this, and got the ball back with just under 50 seconds remaining. Washington got to midfield, but Griffin's hail mary pass was off the mark, and Washington lost once again. With the loss. Washington fell to 0-3 for the first time since 2001, and also lost to the Detroit Lions for the third straight time, having not beaten them since 2008 when they didn't even manage to win a single game. In spite of the wars, the Christian population could definitely settle down in the area thanks to the repopulation with people from the North  who received their first fuero in 1133 from Alfonso VII.In 1219, the king Fernando III gave a new fuero to the city .During the reign of Alfonso X of Castile, the protection of the king allowed the city to develop its economy by protecting merchants and allowing markets..

Question: How many years passed between the city receiving its first fuero and its new one from king Fernando III?
